thread.title: BRIEF-China Biologic To Build New Collection Station In Hainan Province

title: BRIEF-China Biologic To Build New Collection Station In Hainan Province
text: 52 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-China Biologic To Build New Collection Station In Hainan Province Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - China Biologic Products Holdings Inc : * CHINA BIOLOGIC TO BUILD NEW COLLECTION STATION IN HAINAN PROVINCE * CHINA BIOLOGIC PRODUCTS HOLDINGS - CAPEX FOR NEW STATION IN WENCHANG EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT US$3.2 MILLION TO $4.7 MILLION * CHINA BIOLOGIC PRODUCTS - COâ€˜S UNIT RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM HAINAN PROVINCIAL HEALTH & FAMILY PLANNING COMMISSION TO BUILD NEW PLASMA COLLECTION STATION * CHINA BIOLOGIC PRODUCTS HOLDINGS - EXPECTS TO COMMENCE COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS OF NEW STATION, BEFORE END OF 2018 Source text for Eikon:
